text: The Falcon and the Snowman is a 1985 British American Mexican crime drama movie directed by John Schlesinger and based on the 1979 novel by Robert Lindsey. It stars Timothy Hutton, Sean Penn, Pat Hingle, Joyce Van Patten, David Suchet, Richard Dysart, Nicholas Pryor, Lori Singer, Nicholas Pryor and was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 crime drama movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:Mexican crime movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in Mexico
